title.narrative: URG project: Istanbul Process Stocktake meeting, engagement

description.narrative: The objective is to promote action plans set out in the UN Human Rights Council Resolution 16/18, particularly in the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) and Global South countries, to combat religious intolerance, discrimination and hate, and promote freedom of religion and belief.

policy-marker.narrative: Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Organisation of the Istanbul Process Stock take meeting

description.narrative: The Istanbul Process Stock take meeting (April 8, 2019) is organised by the URG and the EU-delegation to the UN in Geneva.
